title: Police investigating daytime Irvington shooting
body: Police outside the scene in Irvington on Saturday afternoon. (Josh Axelrod | NJ Advance Media)Police are investigating a shooting that occurred Saturday afternoon in Essex County, officials said.The shooting took place shortly before 2 p.m. Saturday in the area of Crescent Lane in Irvington, Mayor Tony Vauss told NJ Advance Media.Essex County Chief Assistant Prosecutor Thomas Fennelly confirmed the shooting, but said it was non-fatal and referred additional questions to Irvington police.Calls to Irvington police were not immediately returned.Note to readers: if you purchase something through one of our affiliate links we may earn a commission.
